DOC.brief_summary: This attempt investigate perception Greek Ophthalmologists regard generic prescription glaucoma mean structured questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Greek Physicians Perceptions Regarding Generics Prescribing Glaucoma
DOC.detailed_description: The following dimension record 1 . Overall physician 's empathy regard generic glaucoma 2 . Physician 's prescribing habit regard generic glaucoma 3 . Physician 's perception regard generic cost-effectiveness glaucoma 4 . Physician 's perception regard adequacy Greek regulatory authority ( generic market glaucoma ) 5 . Physician 's perception regard adequacy European regulatory authority ( generic market glaucoma )
